results.t: Aria browser AI | Free AI with real-time web access
results.p: Aria, Opera Browser's AI, is free on desktop and mobile. Generate images and text, and get up-to-date answers in over 50 languages.

results.t: From Aria to Vibrato: A Glossary of Opera Terms
results.p: Access ChatGPT from the sidebar, and unlock the full power of AI with Aria, Opera's browser AI: generate images, content, webpage summaries and more.
